system.description:
Ghosts of those killed by drowning, manifesting as fish-headed water demons. They spout jets of water, strike with spears made of seaweed, and will stop at nothing until they are removed from drowning.

(The stats provided here is for a Rank 1 encounter. Check the book for higher ranks.)
system.attacks:
Inflict Violence: Water Javelin. Attack an enemy in range 5 with Bravery, then douse the target. If the target is already doused, inflict +1d.

Gambits [[/r d10]]

1-3: Rush > Rush > Inflict Violence

4-6: Rush > Inflict Violence > Rope [1]: Slide 1 an enemy in range 5.

7-9: Rush > Water Beam [2]: Attack all enemies in line 10 with Bravery, then douse them. If already doused, add +Faith to the attack.

10: Dive [3]: Teleport adjacent to any water tile. Then, attack all enemies (once per enemy) in burst 1 of every water tile with Bravery + Faith.

traits.name: Walking Dead
traits.description: When Dead fall to 0 HP, they become a pile of grudge. However, they still Riff: at the start of their Riff, they have a 33% chance of reforming and heal 2 HP, and they can riff again. Piles of grudges can be exorcised by spending 1 Beat while close to them. Once Exorcised, they are removed from play. Any Dead that falls to 0 HP by fire or burning holy radiance are immediately exorcised.

traits.name: Earthen Body
traits.description: All Dead are immune to poison, bleed, and chill.

traits.name: Drown
traits.description: When hitting with a ranged attack, change a tile adjacent to the target to shallow water. All attacks against enemies on shallow water are overwhelming and skewering.
